title: Himi 232
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he loto lelei,
‘I he ‘ene ‘ofa,
He ‘oku tau kei mo’ui,
‘O hoko ki he ta’u fo’ou.
2.
Ko e ‘akau kovi,
‘A kitautolu.
Pea fua kovi,
Ko e angahala;
Na’e tonu ke tau mate,
Pea laku ki he afi.
3.
Na’e hufekina,
‘E he tauhi ngoue;
‘A e ngaahi ‘akau,
Na’e ta’e fua;
Tuku ai pē ‘i he ta’u ni,
Pea u taufetuku ki ai.
4.
Sīsū fakafeta’i,
‘I ho hūfekina,
‘A e tu’utāmaki,
Ki homau ‘Otua,
Ko ia kuo mau lava,
‘O hoko ki he ta’u fo’ou. *
